verses.name: 1 John 5:12
verses.text: He that hath the Son hath life; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life.

verses.name: 1 John 5:13
verses.text: These things have I written unto you that believe on the name of the Son of God; that ye may know that ye have eternal life, and that ye may believe on the name of the Son of God.

verses.name: 1 John 5:14
verses.text: And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us:
